short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to check IoC using VirusTotal API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The VTotal Checker is a powerful browser extension designed to enhance your cybersecurity efforts by leveraging the capabilities of VirusTotal's API. This tool allows users to quickly and efficiently analyze potential threats by searching for various indicators of compromise (IoCs) such as IP addresses, URLs and file hashes (MD5, SHA1, SHA256) directly from the web page.

Multi-Indicator Search:
Input multiple IoCs (IP addresses, Domain, URLs, file hashes) in one go.

API Key Management:
Easily enter and save your VirusTotal API key within the extension.

Results Presentation:
Comprehensive display of results in a structured table format. Each IoC result includes IoC type, detection count, and vendor breakdowns, facilitating informed decision-making.

Reference:
https://www.hendryadrian.com/tools/vtotal/
